entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Kangirsuk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:49 AM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -37.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kangirsuk Airport 08:00 AM EST Saturday 18 February 2023
Temperature: -37.3°C
Pressure: 100.7 kPa
Humidity: 68 %
Wind Chill: -48
Dewpoint: -41.1°C
Wind: NW 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 33.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this morning. High minus 33. Wind chill minus 53 this morning and minus 43 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 39.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming west 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 39. Wind chill minus 46 this evening and minus 54 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 35.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 35. Wind chill minus 55 in the morning and minus 45 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 35. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 35. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Saturday 18 February 2023
